ModMetaData.description: 汉化：jxb12306 Author jxb12306 FROM 3DM Localization Group 合集链接：http://bbs.3dmgame.com/thread-5842015-1-1.html Adds prosthetics/bionics and surgeries for animals 添加了简易动物假肢和动物仿生组织。 Following parts are added to the game: 以下列出的部位被添加入游戏之中。 A Dog Said Research Tab: Simple Animal Prosthetics, Animal Bionics, Animal Healing 狗曰研究标签卡：简易动物假肢，动物仿生学，动物治愈 * animal brain stimulator * bionic animal eyes * bionic animal heart * bionic animal lung * bionic animal kidney * bionic animal liver * bionic animal stomach * simple/bionic animal ears * simple/bionic animal jaw * simple/bionic animal spine * simple/bionic animal arms * peglegs * simple/bionic animal legs * simple prosthetic tail * simple prosthetic nose * power claws as leg replacements *仿生动物大脑刺激器 *仿生动物眼 *仿生动物心脏 *仿生动物肺 *仿生动物肾 *仿生动物肝脏 *仿生动物胃 *简易的/仿生动物人工耳 *简易的/仿生动物人工颌 *简易的/仿生动物脊椎 *简易的/仿生动物臂 *木制假腿 *简易的/仿生动物腿 *简易的/仿生动物尾巴 *简易的/仿生动物鼻子 *动力爪 All parts can be obtained from traders, except peglegs. All parts can be crafted at the animal prosthetics bench, after research of electricity and simple animal prosthetics 所有的部位可以从商人处获得，除了木制假腿。 所有的部位可以在动物假体工作台制造，但是需要研究电力以及狗曰标签卡中的科技。 All parts need medicine skill and 1 medicine to be installed. 所有的部位需要不同的医疗技能等级以及1单位医药来给动物安装。 Animal Healing of old wounds requires research, min med skill of 10 and 5 normal medicine. (make sure animals are set to receive it, applies to all animal categories) 如果要给动物治愈旧伤需要研究对应科技，需要最少10级医疗技能和5单位医药。（确保动物已准备好医疗，适用于所有动物类别） Animals and what part they can receive have been divided into 3 categories as follows: 动物能安装何种部位被分为以下3个目录： Category 1: can receive peglegs, simple jaws, noses and tails (where applicable) 目录1：能安装木制假腿，简易的人工颌，鼻子和尾巴（如果动物有的话） Alphabeaver Boomrat Capybara Cassowary Chicken Chinchilla Cobra Deer Emu Gazelle Hare Hare Snow Ibex Iguana Megascarab Raccoon Rat Squirrel Tortoise Turkey Category 2: can receive all category 1 + simple prosthetics, ears/eyes/organs 目录2：能安装目录1列出的部位+简易的假肢，耳朵/眼睛/器官 Boomalope Caribou Cat Cow Elk Fox Fennec Fox Arctic Fox Red Monkey Ostrich Pig Spelopede Wild Boar Yorkie Category 3: can receive all categories 1+2 + bionics, powerclaws 目录3：能安装目录1+2列出的部位+仿生部位，动力爪 Bear Grizzly Alpaca Bear Polar Cougar Dromedary Elphant Husky Labrador Lynx Megasloth Megaspider Muffalo Panther Rhino Thrumbo Warg Wolf Arctic Wolf Timber
